chapter.title: Download Oxygen Author

On the web start page, click the appropriate link to launch the Rackspace/OpenStack edition of SyncRO Soft's <oXygen/> XML Editor or Author.

listitem.para: Run <oXygen/> Author: Use to edit Rackbook (DocBook) documents and WADL files.
Run <oXygen/> Editor: Use to edit Rackbook (DocBook) documents and WADL files. Also includes XSD and XSLT-related features.

chapter.para: The total size of the Java web start (JWS) bundle is about 87 MBs. The download should only take a few minutes on a reasonably fast connection.

When you run the application for the first time, JWS downloads the entire package, which contains 15 jar files. When JWS finishes the download, press Start. After the application launches, you must supply a valid oXygen Editor or Author license.

When you launch the application again in the future, JWS checks only for modified jar files (an upgrade) and downloads them if necessary. If no new jars are found or network connectivity is not available, the application starts immediately.

note.para: If you install oXygen through JWS and add oXygen plugins to that installation, those plugins are removed when oXygen is updated.
